page.title: 12BOTTISHAM PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: This school was opened in 1972 to serve Bottisham.Later Quy and Lode were added to the catchment area. Children between the ages of three and eleven attend this school.The Nursery looks after the children until the term in which they become five,when they move into a first year class. Children usually stay in the same class for one year.Each class usually contains all of the children in one year group.Within the classes children are set work which suits their ability and progress.There are 10.8 teachers and 260 children. The curriculum is wide and includes science ,music,sports,etc. All classes enjoy using the computer, although at the moment we all have to share one.
